name: AntiMaze
description:
Welcome to AntiMaze. You are a bomb, and your fuse is lit! Navigate the randomly generated mazes and get to the water before you explode!

You can explode walls to create shortcuts, but that will kill you and send you back to the beginning. See how many levels you can beat before the diminishing time limits get to you.

Move with WASD or arrow keys.

Made with p5.js and howler.js, in about 60 hours for Wowie Jam 3.0. If the sound sounds glitchy, reload the page.
